<%sL_FURNITURE> to be displayed.

123672.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置く場所を\n決めてください。\nあと<%nL_:
Please choose where to place the
<%sL_FURNITURE>. You can place
<%dL_AVAILABLE_NUM> more pieces of furniture.
<break>

123673.これ以上 家具を置けません。: You can't place any more furniture.

123674.<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE>は \n他の人に わたすことがで:
<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE> can't be placed because
it's unable to be traded to others.

123675.かたづけられた家具を すべて置かないと\n新たな家具は 置けません。:
New furniture cannot be placed until all the
existing furniture has been placed.

123677.家具の配置権限がないため\n<%sL_FURNITURE>を \nうごかすことは:
You do not have permission to place the
furniture and cannot invoke <%sL_FURNITURE>.

123678.家具の配置権限がないため\n家具を置くことは できません。:
Furniture cannot be placed because you do not
have permission to place furniture.

123679.家を建ててから\n家具や庭具を 配置してください。\n<end>:
Place furniture and garden furniture after the
house is built.
<end>

123680.この家具は 庭具なので\n外に置いてください。\n<end>:
This is garden furniture and can only
be placed outside.
<end>

123681.この家具は 庭具ではないので\n室内に置いてください。\n<end>:
This is not garden furniture and can only
be placed indoors.
<end>

123682.<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE>は \n家のオーナーしか 配置す:
<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE> can only be placed
by the house's owner.

to be laid down.

123685.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置く場所を\n決めてください。\nあと<%nL_:
Please decide where to place the
<%sL_FURNITURE>. You can place
<%dL_AVAILABLE_NUM> more pieces of outdoor furniture.
<break>

123686.これ以上 庭具を置けません。: You can't place any more garden furniture.

123687.<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE>は \n他の人に わたすことがで:
<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE> can't be placed because
it's unable to be traded to others.

123688.かたづけられた庭具を すべて置かないと\n新たな庭具は 置けません。:
New garden furniture cannot be placed until
all the existing garden furniture has been
placed.

123690.庭具の配置権限がないため\n<%sL_FURNITURE>を \nうごかすことは:
You don't have placement permissions, so you
can't move the <%sL_FURNITURE>.

123691.庭具の配置権限がないため\n庭具を置くことは できません。:
You cannot place garden furniture because you
do not have permission to place garden
furniture.

123692.家を建ててから\n家具や庭具を 配置してください。\n<end>:
Place furniture and garden furniture after the
house is built.
<end>

123693.この家具は 庭具なので\n外に置いてください。\n<end>:
This is garden furniture and can only
be placed outside.
<end>

123694.この家具は 庭具ではないので\n室内に置いてください。\n<end>:
This is not garden furniture and can only
be placed indoors.
<end>

123695.<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE>は \n家のオーナーしか 配置す:
<speed=0><%sL_FURNITURE> can only be placed
by the house's owner.

123847.予期せぬエラーにより\n処理を実行することが できませんでした。:
Due to an unexpected error, the process could
not be executed.

123848.予期せぬエラーにより\n処理を実行することが できませんでした。:
Due to an unexpected error, the process could
not be executed.

123849.貯金箱を 置いたので\n家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n引き出すことが:
Now that you have placed the Gold Box, you can deposit and withdraw money from your house to the Gold Bank! Only the owner of the house can
use the Gold Box. Only the owner of the house can use the Gold Box, and no one else can touch the money.

123850.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that you have a Dress-Up Doll, you can dress your own equipment on your Dress-Up Doll and display it! You can equip your own
equipment on Dress-Up Doll from the "Kisekae- shiru" menu. You can equip Dress-Up Doll with your own equipment from the "Kisekae" menu,
and you can change your own equipment and Dress-Up Doll's equipment in one shot by using the "One shot change" menu. However, if there
is equipment that you cannot equip, or if there is new equipment, you will not be able to perform a one-shot change.

123851.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that you have a Dress-Up Doll, you can dress your own equipment on your Dress-Up Doll and display it! You can equip your own
equipment on the Dress-Up Doll from the "Kisekae-shiru" menu. You can equip Dress-Up Doll with your own equipment from the
"Kisekae" menu, and you can change your own equipment and Dress-Up Doll's equipment in one shot by using the "One shot change" menu.
However, if there are items that you cannot equip, you will not be able to use the one- shot change function. This Dress-Up Doll can
be used only when the One Time Password is set. Please note that if you stop setting the one-time password, you will not be able to
remove the equipment you have put on the doll.

123852.不明なエラーにより\n処理を終了できませんでした。:
The process could not be terminated due to an
unknown error.

123853.この家具は 他の人が つかっています。: This is being used by someone else.

123855.ここに 家具は 配置できません。\n家具は 平らなところに 置きましょう。:
You cannot place that here. Try again on a
flat surface.

123856.ここに 家具は 配置できません。\n家具は 家の中か庭に置きましょう。:
You cannot place that here. Try again either
inside or outside of your home.

123857.近くに たくさんの家具があるので\nここには 置けません。:
There is too much furniture nearby, so you
can't place that here.

123858.床下水そう用ハッチを 置いたので\n釣ったさかなを 水そう床に飾れるように\nな:
You placed down a Water Hatch! Now you can display fish that you've caught in your aquarium floor!
There are five different types of aquarium floors to choose from, and you can display a maximum of five fish at once.
Only the house's owner can put in or remove fish, but anyone can view the aquarium floor's details.
Try showing off your most prized catches in your aquarium floor!

123859.モンスターのおうちを 置いたので\nお庭に 仲間モンスターをはなすことが\nでき:
Now you can release a companion monster in your garden by placing a monster house in the garden. You can also choose whether to let the
companion monster stay at the monster's house or go for a walk around the neighborhood. You can also stroke other people's companion
monsters, and the companion monster will reward the master with a gift based on the number of times it is stroked. Let's stroke
them together!

123860.郵便ポストを 置いたので \nポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n受け取ったり:
Now that you have installed a Mailbox, you can send and receive letters and packages from your mailbox! The letters and packages that
can be received at the mailbox are the same as those received at the Post Office. The mailbox has "Receive", "Send", and "Receive Sales"
options, but only the owner of the house can use the mailbox. However, authorized users can send letters and packages to the owner of the
house by putting them directly into the mailbox. The permission settings can be changed by calling the administrator from the
door menu and selecting "Use Mailbox" from the administrator's menu. The "View P.O. Box" section allows you to view some of the letters
sent to adventurers, such as seasonal events and limited time offerings.

123861.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人が \nメッ:
I have placed <%sL_FURNITURE> so that visitors to my house can leave messages! Each person can leave up to 3 messages per day. Up to 3
messages per person per day, up to a maximum of 30 messages can be saved. When someone leaves a message, Slime will light up so you
will know immediately. Messages can also be viewed by visitors, so you can write your own message as well!

123862.モーモンバザーを置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人向けの\nお店を開くことが:
Now that you have set up the Sanguini Bazaar, you can open a store for visitors to your home! When an item is sold, the Teeny Sanguini
will become a Pink Sanguini! When there are no more items for sale, the face will turn scary. Only the owner of the house can receive the
proceeds. If you have 999 unclaimed sales, you will not be able to sell any more Items. Now let's set up the items for sale!

123863.おもいで映写機を 置きました！\n『映写機をつかう』を選ぶと これまでに見た\n:
We've set up a memory projector! If you select the "Use Projector" option, you'll be able to watch the events of the scenarios
you've seen so far!

123864.収納家具を 設置しました！\n収納家具を設置すると アイテムを\n<%nL_VA:
Storage furniture has been installed! When you install storage furniture, you can store up to <%dL_VAULT_SLOT> types of Items. Please note
that even if you increase the number of storage furniture, the maximum number will remain <%dL_VAULT_SLOT> types.

123865.水そうを 置いたので\n釣ったさかなを 家に飾れるように\nなりました！\n<b:
Now you can display the fish you have caught in your house by installing an aquarium. The aquarium is open to everyone. Now, let's put
the fish you caught in the aquarium on the wall!

123866.貯金箱を 置いたので\n家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n引き出すことが:
Now that you have placed the Gold Box, you can deposit and withdraw money from your house to the Gold Bank! Only the owner of the house can
use the Gold Box. Only the owner of the house can use the Gold Box, and no one else can touch the money.

123867.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:
Now that you have a Dress-Up Doll, you can dress your own equipment on your Dress-Up Doll and display it! You can equip your own
equipment on Dress-Up Doll from the "Kisekae- shiru" menu. You can equip Dress-Up Doll with your own equipment from the "Kisekae" menu,
and you can change your own equipment and Dress-Up Doll's equipment in one shot by using the "One shot change" menu. However, if there
is equipment that you cannot equip, or if there is new equipment, you will not be able to perform a one-shot change.

123868.きせかえドールを置いたので\n自分の装備品を きせかえドールに着せて\n飾れるよ:

123882.水そうを 置いたので\n釣ったさかなを 家に飾れるように\nなりました！\n<b:
Now you can display the fish you have caught in your house by installing an aquarium. The aquarium is open to everyone. Now, let's put

123883.花を栽培中のため 動かせません。\nかかしのコマンドの 『やりなおす』をすれば\:
The scarecrow cannot be moved because it is
growing flowers. You can move it by "Redo" of
the scarecrow's command.

123884.モンスターがいるため 動かせません。\n『モンスターをひっこめる』から\nモンス:
The monster is still there and cannot be
moved. You can move the monster by putting it
back in the "Remove Monster" menu.

123886.花を栽培中のため 動かせません。\nかかしのコマンドの 『やりなおす』をすれば\:

124222.<%sL_FURNITURE>を 置く場所を\n決めてください。\nあと<%nL:
Please choose where to place the
<%sL_FURNITURE>. You can place
<%dL_AVAILABLE_NUM> more pieces of furniture outside.
<break>

125429.壁かけ家具は 配置する時に\n位置と奥行きを 決めることができます。\n配置後に:
The position and depth of the wall-mounted furniture can be determined at the time of placement. Only the depth can be adjusted
after placement. In places where wall-hanging furniture cannot be placed, the furniture itself becomes translucent. During placement,
you will not be able to see yourself.

125430.壁かけ家具は 配置する時に\n位置と奥行きを 決めることができます。\n配置後に:
The position and depth of the wall-mounted furniture can be determined at the time of placement. Only the depth can be adjusted
after placement. In places where wall-hanging furniture cannot be placed, the furniture itself becomes translucent. During placement,
you will not be able to see yourself.

125522.家具を 配置できませんでした。\n壁かけ家具は 壁に配置しましょう。:
Furniture could not be placed. Wall-mounted
furniture should be placed on the wall.

125523.家具を 配置できませんでした。\n壁かけ家具は 壁に配置しましょう。:
Furniture could not be placed. Wall-mounted
furniture should be placed on the wall.

139347.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n絵葉書を 家具に設定して\nかざれ:
Now that you've placed a <%sL_FURNITURE>, you can hang your own personal postcards as furniture!
You can select a postcard you are carrying and display it on the <%sL_FURNITURE> by selecting "Set Postcard".
Only postcards stored under "Written Mail" can be displayed. Postcards that you have already sent cannot be displayed.
The displayed postcard can be viewed by anyone, but only the house's owner is allowed to change it.
Also, only one type of photo can be displayed for each different type of frame. The same types of frame will display the same postcard.

139348.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n絵葉書を 家具に設定して\nかざれ:
Now that you've placed a <%sL_FURNITURE>, you can hang your own personal postcards as furniture!
You can select a postcard you are carrying and display it on the <%sL_FURNITURE> by selecting "Set Postcard".
Only postcards stored under "Written Mail" can be displayed. Postcards that you have already sent cannot be displayed.
The displayed postcard can be viewed by anyone, but only the house's owner is allowed to change it.
Also, only one type of photo can be displayed for each different type of frame. The same types of frame will display the same postcard.

143981.ドルステーションを置いたので\nお庭にドルボードを 飾ることが\nできるようにな:
Now that you have a Dol Station, you can display your Dolboards in your yard! If you want to change the color of the Dolboard on
the Dol Station to the latest version, you can do so by putting the Dolboard on the Dol Station again.

143982.ドルステーションを置いたので\nお庭にドルボードを 飾ることが\nできるようにな:
Now that you have a Dol Station, you can display your Dolboards in your yard! If you want to change the color of the Dolboard on
the Dol Station to the latest version, you can do so by putting the Dolboard on the Dol Station again.

144113.この場所では 壁かけ家具は配置できません。\n床に立って 配置してください。:
Wall-mounted furniture cannot be placed in
this location. Please place it standing on the
floor.

144114.この場所では 壁かけ家具は配置できません。\n床に立って 配置してください。:
Wall-mounted furniture cannot be placed in
this location. Please place it standing on the
floor.

153904.この家具の上には\n家具を 置くことはできません。:
No furniture can be placed on top of this
furniture.

153905.この家具の上には\nこれ以上 重ね置きできません。:
No more can be stacked on top of this
furniture.

153906.この庭具は\n重ね置きすることが できません。: This garden furniture cannot be stacked.

153907.この庭具の上には\n庭具を 置くことはできません。:
No garden furniture can be placed on top of
this garden furniture.

153908.この庭具の上には\nこれ以上 重ね置きできません。:
It cannot be stacked on top of this garden
furniture any more.

159535.ここに この家具は 配置できません。: Indoor furniture cannot be placed here.

159536.ここに この庭具は 配置できません。: Garden furniture cannot be placed here.

192206.視点の範囲外に 配置された家具なので\n移動できません。:
The furniture cannot be moved because it is
placed outside the range of the viewpoint.

192207.家具・庭具リストからは\n壁かけ家具を 配置できません。\n<br>\n扉メニュ:
Wall-hanging furniture cannot be placed from the furniture/garden furniture list. Please rearrange the wall-hanging furniture in the
"furniture in place" menu of the door menu.

192208.視点の範囲外に 配置された家具なので\n移動できません。:

placed outside the range of the viewpoint.

192209.家具・庭具リストからは\n壁かけ家具を 配置できません。\n<br>\n扉メニュ:
Wall-hanging furniture cannot be placed from the furniture/garden furniture list. Please rearrange the wall-hanging furniture in the

193800.家具配置の開始位置が 視点の外にあるため\n足元を 視点に入れる 必要があります:
The start of the furniture placement is outside the viewpoint and the feet need to be placed in the viewpoint. Do you want to
disable fixed viewpoint mode?

193801.家具配置の開始位置が 視点の外にあるため\n足元を 視点に入れる 必要があります:
The start of the furniture placement is outside the viewpoint and the feet need to be placed in the viewpoint. Do you want to

200032.家具・庭具リストからは\n壁かけ家具を 配置できません。\n<br>\n扉メニュ:
Wall-hanging furniture cannot be placed from the furniture/garden furniture list. Please place the wall-hanging furniture again using
"Saved furniture" in the "Placed furniture" menu of the door menu.

286386.<%sL_FURNITURE>を 置いたので\nアストルティア放送局の 放送を\:
This <%sL_FURNITURE> will allow you to watch the Astoltia Broadcast from the comfort of your own home.
Only the house's owner is allowed to operate this.
In order to view broadcasts, please set "Watch" to "On" under "Misc.", "Settings", "Preferences", "Astoltia Broadcast Station".
If you have any questions, please speak to Broadcaster DV located at the Observatory in Mount Gatara.
Please watch the broadcast with good manners and enjoy the show!

286387.<%sL_FURNITURE>を 置いたので\nアストルティア放送局の 放送を\:
This <%sL_FURNITURE> will allow you to watch the Astoltia Broadcast from the comfort of your own home.
Only the house's owner is allowed to operate this.
In order to view broadcasts, please set "Watch" to "On" under "Misc.", "Settings", "Preferences", "Astoltia Broadcast Station".
If you have any questions, please speak to Broadcaster DV located at the Observatory in Mount Gatara.
Please watch the broadcast with good manners and enjoy the show!

296908.ついてクンマットを 配置したので 所持している\nついてクンを 呼び出すことがで:
Since you placed down a Pet Mat, you can now call over pets that you own!
"Choose Pet" allows you to call pets that you own inside or outside your house.
"Remove Pet" can remove the pet that you've called.
"House Pet Settings" allows you to change the behavior of your pets, their name display, and more.
You can also toggle pet sounds, as well as whether or not to display the Pet Mat itself.
Each pet can only be called to a single Pet Mat at a time.
Please note that "House Pet Settings" will not reflect any pets currently following you.
You can place up to 10 Pet Mats each both indoors and outdoors.

296909.ついてクンマットを 配置したので 所持している\nついてクンを 呼び出すことがで:
Since you placed down a Pet Mat, you can now call over pets that you own!
"Choose Pet" allows you to call pets that you own inside or outside your house.
"Remove Pet" can remove the pet that you've called.
"House Pet Settings" allows you to change the behavior of your pets, their name display, and more.
You can also toggle pet sounds, as well as whether or not to display the Pet Mat itself.
Each pet can only be called to a single Pet Mat at a time.
Please note that "House Pet Settings" will not reflect any pets currently following you.
You can place up to 10 Pet Mats each both indoors and outdoors.

296910.フェスタ・インフェルノの 開催をお知らせする\nワープ装置・フェスタを 配置しま:
You've placed a Festa Warp Device that will announce whenever Festa Inferno is active.
When the event is active, the Warp Device's appearance will change.
You can then use the Warp Device to teleport near Festa Inferno. Please note that you must meet the participation requirements.

300436.特定の時間になると 自動で 鐘が鳴りだす\n時の鐘を 配置しました。\n毎日 リ:
You placed an Hour Bell, which automatically chimes at certain times. Every day at 5 PM JST, the bell will ring once.
Furthermore, there's an annual treat! Around 10:30 PM JST on December 31st, the bell will start ringing.
The bell will ring a total of 108 times, so please enjoy the calm, New Years atmosphere!

310823.回復の泉を 配置したので おうちや お庭で\nフィールド各所にある 回復の泉と:
You placed a Healing Fountain! Just like the
fountains found out in the world, you can now
recover HP from the comfort of your home!

312815.マルチ水そうを 置いたので\n釣ったさかなを 家に飾れるように\nなりました！\:
You placed a Multi-Fish Aquarium! Now you can decorate your home with various types of fish you've caught!
You can place one of these aquariums in your home, and it can five fish up to Large size.
Additionally, even fish of the same species may swim differently or change position based on their size.
Only the home's owner may change the fish inside, and anyone can view information about the fish placed within it.
We hope you have fun decorating the aquarium with all sorts of fish!
